polyIBD 0.5.0

polyIBD

Purpose

R package for inferring blocks of identity by descent (IBD) from un-phased haplotypic data.

Installation

To install the current version of polyIBD, first ensure that you have the R-package devtools:

install.packages("devtools")

Then download and build polyIBD from Github with:

devtools::install_github("nickbrazeau/polyIBD")
